name: SimplyCook Limited
description: Provider of a subscription-based service designed to make cooking new meals accessible for all. The company's subscription-based service offers new concept recipe kits containing recipe cards and natural ingredient blends with culinary taste ingredients, enabling its members to expand their meal repertoire with ease.
